name: Last Day of Serenity Orbital Station
name_original: Last Day of Serenity Orbital Station
description:
Destroy meteors to delay the destruction of the Serenity Orbital Station and allow the scape pods find security away from the asteroid field!

*On rails shooter made for Ludum Dare 50, Black and White Jam 8 and Mini Jam 103

## Controls

WASD | Arrows | Directional - move the ship

Spacebar | Mouse Left | Fire 1 - to shoot
